case.name: Krok v The Commissioner of Taxation of the Commonwealth of Australia [2009] FCA 1497 (9 December 2009)

citphrases.citphrase: notices sent by deputy commissioner of taxation requiring information and documents
extension of time for compliance sought on ground that validity of legislation pursuant to which notices sent under challenge in high court
validity of legislation thereupon challenged in proceedings for review
also commissioner said to have omitted to take into account certain relevant considerations
application for judicial review said to be incompetent
whether decisions to serve notices and to refuse extension of time for compliance therewith decisions leading up to the making of assessments of tax
whether validity of legislation under which decisions made able to be challenged in application for judicial review.
